Address: 3320 WOODROW WILSON DRIVE, JACKSON, Mississippi, 39209, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Cal-Maine Foods, Inc. ("we," "us," "our," or the "Company") is the largest producer and marketer of shell eggs in the United States. In fiscal 2018, we sold approximately 1,037.7 million dozen shell eggs, which we believe represented approximately 20% of domestic shell egg consumption. Our total flock of approximately 36.3 million layers and 9.6 million pullets and breeders is the largest in the U.S. Layers are mature female chickens, pullets are female chickens usually under 18 weeks of age, and breeders are male and female chickens used to produce fertile eggs to be hatched for egg production flocks. The Company has one operating segment, which is the production, grading, packaging, marketing and distribution of shell eggs. The majority of our customers rely on us to provide most of their shell egg needs, including specialty and non-specialty eggs. Specialty eggs represent a broad range of products.  ... More ...
